/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. The image is captured in a 360-degree format, offering a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings.
